summary: 15 years of experience in accounts receivable and accounts payable and related accounting functions. Detail-oriented, with strong communication, problem solving, confidentiality, and ability to work in teams or independently. Experienced in treasury operations, bank reconciliations, and year-end close processes.

experience.title: Accountant
experience.description: Conducted analysis to address issues which led to positive outcomes. Increased sales by 17% over a two-year period. Provided onsite training. Monitored multiple databases to track company inventory. Led key projects with positive outcomes. Handled accounts payable and accounts receivable processes; cash receipts, wire transfers, and ACH; prepared journal entries including foreign wire transfers and foreign cash receipts; performed bank reconciliations; ensured year-end closings were smooth; liaised with brokers, banks, treasury operations and other finance staff; maintained documentation for audits.
